name: Platform Power
desc: Moderation, policy shifts, shadowbans, and how platforms decide what counts as “good.”

name: Creator Economy
desc: Sponsorships, burnout, audience capture, and the business models behind online fame.

name: Trends & Aesthetics
desc: Why things go viral, how aesthetics spread, and what trends reveal about status and identity.

name: Digital Identity
desc: Selfhood, parasocial dynamics, the attention economy, and the pressures of being online.

name: Money on the Internet
desc: Scams, side hustles, dropshipping, and how people learn value online.

name: AI & Culture
desc: How generative tools reshape creativity, labor, education, and the definition of “real.”
